an advanced degree or certifications in a related field preferred.<p><br></p>" A minimum of seven years of professional IT experience; plus, 5 years of Business Systems and Data Analysis, and Project Management experience.<p><br></p>" Broad IT domain experience in two or more of the following areas IT areas: Applications Configurations and Development, Architecture, Project Management, or Quality Assurance.<p><br></p>" Previous Agile framework experience acting as a Product Owner providing coaching to business staff for story development.<p><br></p>" Knowledge of the SharePoint application, its capabilities, and experience updating sites;
